## IReferenceMapKeyPolicyValidateOptions.makeValid property

If `true`<!-- -->, the validator coerces keys to some valid value. If `false`<!-- -->, invalid keys cause an error.

**Signature:**

```typescript
makeValid?: boolean;
```
